description: Students can easily submit their assignments online.
functionality: Users can upload files, enter text, or provide links for assignment submissions.
benefits: Ensures all assignments are stored digitally for easy access

description: Teachers can grade assignments and provide feedback to students.
functionality: Teachers can view submitted assignments, grade them, add comments, and provide feedback.
benefits: Facilitates communication between teachers and students

description: Students and teachers can track assignment deadlines.
functionality: Users receive notifications for upcoming assignment deadlines, and they can view a calendar with all assignment due dates.
benefits: Helps students and teachers stay organized
Ensures assignments are submitted on time
Reduces the likelihood of missed deadlines

description: Provides access to resources related to assignments.
functionality: Users can access lecture notes, study materials, reference materials, and other resources relevant to their assignments.
benefits: Supports students in their learning process

description: Enables discussion and collaboration among students and teachers.
functionality: Users can participate in discussion forums to ask questions, seek clarification, and discuss assignment-related topics.

description: Allows students and teachers to monitor assignment progress.
functionality: Users can track the status of assignments, view grades, and monitor completion rates.
benefits: Helps students identify areas for improvement
Allows teachers to assess student performance
